content.text: Match ends, Burnley 1, Leicester City 0.

Substitution, Burnley. James Tarkowski replaces Jeff Hendrick.
Goal!  Burnley 1, Leicester City 0. Sam Vokes (Burnley) left footed shot from very close range to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Michael Keane with a headed pass following a corner.
